alethinophidia.pawns

Class SnakeCareCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.pawns.SnakeCareCenter

  • public class SnakeCareCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    A weird name, I agree. But actually fitting in fact. This class is basically a main care taker of our snake. Responsible of such tasks as creating new Snake Instances (one head and list of tail segments); controlling snake diet by checking if it collided with an item, and then adding item-specific properties to the snake etc. Also controls whether or not snake should die (by low health or collision, using CollisionSolver instance from GamePlayGenerator)
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
